statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery_records WHERE satellite_name = 'Satellite_A';
SELECT id, satellite_name, image_url FROM satellite_imagery_records WHERE capture_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT satellite_name, image_resolution FROM satellite_imagery_records ORDER BY satellite_name, capture_date DESC;
SELECT id, satellite_name, image_resolution FROM satellite_imagery_records WHERE image_resolution IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery_records WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery_records WHERE satellite_name = 'Satellite-A' AND capture_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, satellite_name, image_url FROM satellite_imagery_records WHERE image_resolution = 'High' ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, COUNT(id) AS total_images FROM satellite_imagery_records GROUP BY satellite_name HAVING total_images > 5 ORDER BY total_images DESC;
SELECT id, image_url FROM satellite_imagery_records WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND satellite_name LIKE 'Satellite%' ORDER BY satellite_name ASC, capture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery_records WHERE image_resolution IS NULL OR image_resolution IN ('Low', 'Medium') ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Satellite_Images;
SELECT image_id, image_date FROM Satellite_Images WHERE satellite_name = 'SatelliteA';
SELECT * FROM Satellite_Stats WHERE cloud_cover >= 0.5;
SELECT image_id, cloud_cover FROM Satellite_Stats ORDER BY cloud_cover DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM Satellite_Images;
SELECT * FROM Satellite_Images WHERE satellite_name = 'Satellite1'
SELECT image_id, image_date FROM Satellite_Images ORDER BY image_date DESC
SELECT s.image_id, s.image_date, ss.cloud_cover FROM Satellite_Images s JOIN Satellite_Stats ss ON s.image_id = ss.image_id WHERE image_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Satellite_Stats WHERE cloud_cover > 0.5 ORDER BY cloud_cover ASC
SELECT s.image_id, s.image_url, ss.resolution FROM Satellite_Images s LEFT JOIN Satellite_Stats ss ON s.image_id = ss.image_id
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT id, image_url FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, acquisition_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE satellite_name='SatelliteX';
SELECT DISTINCT orbit_type FROM Satellites;
SELECT image_url, tag_name FROM SatelliteImages JOIN ImageTags ON SatelliteImages.id = ImageTags.image_id WHERE tag_name='Nature' ORDER BY acquisition_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages
SELECT satellite_name, acquisition_date FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC
SELECT image_url, acquisition_date, satellite_name FROM SatelliteImages WHERE satellite_name = 'Satellite-A'
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date, orbit_type FROM Satellites WHERE orbit_type = 'Polar'
SELECT * FROM ImageTags JOIN SatelliteImages ON ImageTags.image_id = SatelliteImages.id
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_name, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_name, satellite_name FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellite_properties WHERE cloud_coverage >= 30;
SELECT image_name, capture_location, capture_time FROM satellite_metadata ORDER BY capture_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, image_name, satellite_name FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, image_name, cloud_coverage FROM satellite_images JOIN satellite_properties ON satellite_images.image_id = satellite_properties.image_id WHERE cloud_coverage < 10;

SELECT satellite_name, capture_location, capture_time FROM satellite_images JOIN satellite_metadata ON satellite_images.image_id = satellite_metadata.image_id WHERE satellite_name = 'SatelliteX' ORDER BY capture_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_properties JOIN image_tags ON satellite_properties.image_id = image_tags.image_id WHERE tag_name = 'nature' ORDER BY cloud_coverage ASC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_title, image_date FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_description FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_title, image_description FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_title, image_description FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY image_title DESC;
SELECT i.image_title, t.tag_name FROM SatelliteImages i JOIN ImageTags t ON i.image_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT i.image_title, l.location_name, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM SatelliteImages i JOIN ImageLocations l ON i.image_id = l.location_id;
SELECT i.image_title, a.annotation_text, a.annotation_date FROM SatelliteImages i JOIN ImageAnnotations a ON i.image_id = a.image_id;
